strapiPost.title: Weekend Roundup
strapiPost.content:
Happy Friday, Northwest Arkansas! Here's your Weekend Roundup:

  • ğŸ¤  Giddy-up: Catch the last two nights of the 78th annual Rodeo of the Ozarks at Parsons Stadium in Springdale with Rope Your Dreams Night on Friday, Jun 23, and Let Freedom Ring Night on Saturday, Jun 24.
  • ğŸï¸ At the Dive In: Put on your swimsuit and inflate the floaties! Dive-In Movies at Wilson Park Pool kicks off this week with the Super Mario Bros. Movie on Friday, Jun 23, at 7:15p.
  • ğŸš² Wheely cool: Siloam Springs will celebrate this month's Fourth Friday with the theme Bike Night at Memorial Park on Jun 23 from 4-8p.
  • ğŸ« Berry nice: Gather your friends and family for the Fourth Annual Berry Fest at The Berry Farm in Bentonville on Saturday, Jun 24, from 2-7p! Btw, tickets are almost out!
  • ğŸ„ Float & flow: Learn how to paddleboard with instructors from Cocoon Yoga Lab during the Paddle & Play session at Lake Atalanta in Rogers this Saturday, Jun 23, from 4-5:30p.
  • ğŸ’ Bucket o' blossoms: Pick fresh flowers and build beautiful bouquets at Mount Olive Farms' Upick flower field, opening for the season this Saturday, Jun 24, from 8-11a.

Go have some fun!
